virtual-list-horizontal.desc: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

virtual-list-slice-size.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtual-list-item-size.desc: Default size of an option (height or width for horizontal mode), in px - will be used for rendering the initial list. Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item.

component.desc: HTML component to render as container

items.desc: Available list items that will be passed to the scoped slot. For best performance freeze the list of items. Required if itemsFn is not supplied.

items-size.desc: Number of available items in the list. Required and used only is itemsFn is provided.

items-fn.desc: Function to return the scope for the items to be displayed. Should return an array for items starting from `from` index for size length.

from.desc: Index of the first item (0 based)

returns.desc: List of scope for items to be displayed

examples: :items-fn="(from, size) => { const items = []; for (let i = 0; i < size; i++) { items.push(`Item ${i}`) }; return items }"

scroll-target.desc: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as scroll container instead of the root element of virtual list

default.desc: Template slot for defining the list item; Suggestion: QItem

index.desc: Item index in the options list

item.desc: Item data -- its value is taken from 'options' prop

virtual-scroll.desc: Emitted when the virtual list scrolls

details.desc: Object of properties on the new scroll position

index.desc: Index of the list item that was scrolled into view (0 based)

from.desc: The index of the first list item that is rendered (0 based)

to.desc: The index of the last list item that is rendered (0 based)

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

index.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)

scrollUp.desc: Specify if the list scrolls up
